meanings.definition: Resembling rubber in texture or elasticity.
meanings.sent1: The rubbery ball bounced high when thrown.
meanings.sent2: The new shoes felt rubbery and flexible.
meanings.sent3: The rubbery cake was so bouncy, it almost jumped off the plate!
meanings.sent4: Her rubbery smile stretched from ear to ear.
meanings.sent5: The rubbery material stretched like taffy in the heat.

meanings.sent1: The rubbery jelly wobbled on the plate.
meanings.sent2: The overcooked pasta was rubbery and hard to chew.
meanings.sent3: The rubbery pillow refused to support his head, causing a comical scene.
meanings.sent4: Her rubbery excuses for being late were transparent to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The rubbery tree branches bent easily in the wind.

meanings.definition: Having a taste or texture reminiscent of rubber.
meanings.sent1: The rubbery gummy candy stuck to his teeth.
meanings.sent2: The undercooked steak was rubbery and difficult to swallow.
meanings.sent3: The rubbery pizza crust was like chewing on a tire!
meanings.sent4: Her rubbery voice echoed through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The rubbery eraser left smudges on the paper.
